advance-directive.title: Advance Directive
advance-directive.description: Tell doctors your medical wishes if you can't speak for yourself. Covers life support, feeding tubes, and end-of-life care.

advance-directive-revocation.title: Advance Directive Revocation
advance-directive-revocation.description: Cancel your previous advance directive when your medical wishes change. Important to keep documents current.

clinical-trial-agreement.title: Clinical Trial Agreement
clinical-trial-agreement.description: Participate in medical research studies safely. Understand risks, benefits, and your rights as a research participant.

coaching-agreement.title: Coaching Agreement
coaching-agreement.description: Hire a life coach, business coach, or wellness coach. Sets expectations, goals, and payment terms for coaching services.

fitness-waiver.title: Fitness Waiver
fitness-waiver.description: Protect your gym or fitness business from injury lawsuits. Required legal protection for personal trainers and fitness centers.

health-care-directive.title: Health Care Directive
health-care-directive.description: Document your healthcare preferences for serious medical situations. Guides family and doctors when you can't decide.

healthcare-power-of-attorney.title: Healthcare Power Of Attorney
healthcare-power-of-attorney.description: Choose someone to make medical decisions for you if you can't. Essential backup for emergencies and serious illness.

hipaa-authorization-form.title: Hipaa Authorization Form
hipaa-authorization-form.description: Allow someone to access your medical records and talk to doctors. Required for family members to get health information.

living-will.title: Living Will
living-will.description: Tell doctors exactly what medical treatments you want or don't want if you're dying or permanently unconscious.

medical-consent.title: Medical Consent
medical-consent.description: Give permission for medical treatment for yourself or your children. Required for most medical procedures and surgeries.

medical-consent-form.title: Medical Consent Form
medical-consent-form.description: Simple form to authorize medical treatment. Perfect for schools, camps, and caregivers who might need emergency care.

medical-power-of-attorney.title: Medical Power Of Attorney
medical-power-of-attorney.description: Appoint someone to make all your healthcare decisions if you become unable to communicate your wishes.

personal-training-agreement.title: Personal Training Agreement
personal-training-agreement.description: Hire a personal trainer with clear expectations about workouts, goals, and safety. Protects both trainer and client.

telemedicine-agreement.title: Telemedicine Agreement
telemedicine-agreement.description: Get medical care through video calls and online consultations. Sets expectations for remote healthcare services.
